body: came back to this and just gotta say that these bitches fucking deserve more pain
when the fuck is this gonna get a translation, the first part also needs one
Well, this is vengeance with some extra

On the other hand, I feel no pity for the two bitches, from the start of this story, it looks like they crossed the final line that made him go postal (Likely taunting him with what happened in the last story when they forced him to rape his own sister after she tried to save him from their bullying). From their expressions they were taking some sadistic pleasure in tormenting him with that shit then the other shit they did to him! They at least got a harsh reality check on what happens when "you cross the line!" (Like Spoiled kids, they learn "Mommy & Daddies Connects/money/influence" can only protect you so far! "Vigilante Justice" is what happens when those who have such a safety net from legitimate retaliation push their limit! Yeah they could get revenge on him later on with those things! But the trauma of what happened to them and any physical trauma as well will remain for the rest of their lives! That's why they say "Karma is a bitch!")

@Md490 So basically he's holding a grudge on her for just giving up after what happened in the last story (when they made him rape her) and turning her eyes away just like everyone else did (I can understand her trauma after that, but I can see why her trying to cope and ignoring him after that caused him to think she "betrayed" him by distancing herself from him while they still tormented him till he snapped and well we got this story!). Kind of sad, but fitting with the atmosphere of the story! He's only was left with the choice of giving up or getting revenge! But the high from that revenge made him as monstrous if not more then the two bitches. I guess he now hates females in general (not in the SJW accuse manner, but in the "legit" reasoning for hating someone or something! One can't blame someone for hating dogs if growing up every dog they came across treated them like shit and returned friendliness with Evil cruelty! One can only tolerate for so long)

@Hentai24998 Well to be fair, "Authority & Police" do exist in many NTR! But it's to protect the "Alpha Chad Asshole of the story!" (Bonus if the stolen girlfriend lies and claims her "ex" was the one to be aggressive first to further drive the knife that she's a traitorous harpy THOT in more LOL). They don't exist so the writer never has to explain how said asshole (especially the scummy blackmailing Teachers/Coach) could get away (but then said girl has to be made stupider then usual to also make it work in his favor! Such as Isolating herself from ANY help in fear of exposure). I only seen them still not existing to be "Cavalry Betrayal" to the cuck in a rare few! (It's why I want to slap the idiots who claim how "realistic" those are when everything in the damn thing was "out there!" Plot Armor & Diablos Ex Machina are annoying when their "bluntly" used in front of the audience with the hope a "Cuck Simp Fan Horde" will hand wave it for them and shield them from legit criticism.
You see that, cucks in hentai? There are no polices or anyone who actually do anything to crimes in your world so just do whatever you like instead of crying like a a little bitch.
